course.subject: CORE
course.name: Music of China
course.description: This course will look at various forms of Chinese music, focusing in particular on instrumental genres. Although the aim is not to present the history of Chinese music per se, the topical organization of the course will follow a more or less chronological framework as attention is drawn to certain issues and prominent characteristics of music and musical life in China from ancient times to the present. The ability to read music or knowledge of musical notation would be helpful, but not required.
course.prerequisites: a passing letter grade in CORE 1401 OR CORE 1402 OR CORE 1403 OR CORE 1404 OR LANG 1002 (prior to 2022-23)

reviews.author: Junny
reviews.title: 有興趣先好讀

reviews.comment_teaching:
冇之前啲review講得咁差
可能比人投訴過所以好啲
至少冇捉人出嚟答問題,答唔到就笑人之類
上堂正正常常,個course少人所以都多互動
reviews.comment_grading:
Grading Breakdown:

Class attendance & active participation 15%
Pop quizzes 10% (得一次iprs咁多）
Occasional short written assignments 10%
Midterm exam 20%
Concert or Audio/Video Recording Review 20%
Final exam 25%

個review原本話可以canvas睇片,結果考midterm果個星期變左field trip,唔去就唔洗做了

肯記就有分,但係mean都幾高
reviews.comment_workload:
作為common core算多野做
Assignment week 1 比左份,之後到final前又一次過幾份。Quiz又係,好似唔記得左咁
然後加上突然多左個field trip, 雖然做嘅嘢唔多,但係好混亂同好麻煩
